widgets.title: Charges per service
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(`provider.estimatedCharges.Maximum`) from FinanceSample where provider='BillingServiceCost'  since 1 day ago facet `provider.serviceName` limit 100

widgets.title: ELB Requests per second, by region
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.requestCount.Sum`) from LoadBalancerSample WHERE  provider  = 'Elb' FACET awsRegion

widgets.title: EBS Volume Consumed
widgets.nrql: select average(`provider.volumeWriteBytes.Average`) + average(`provider.volumeWriteBytes.Average`) from BlockDeviceSample WHERE provider = 'EbsVolume'  facet displayName TIMESERIES SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: API GW 5xx Errors
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.5xxError.Sum`) AS Error5xx FROM ApiGatewaySample WHERE provider = 'ApiGatewayApi'  TIMESERIES FACET displayName SINCE 1565095188304 UNTIL 1565699988304

widgets.title: Lambda Events from Infra Agent
widgets.nrql: SELECT * FROM InfrastructureEvent WHERE source LIKE 'aws/lambda%' SINCE 4 week ago

widgets.title: DynamoDB - % of provisioned write consumed
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.consumedWriteCapacityUnits.Sum` / (`provider.provisionedWriteCapacityUnits.Average` * 60 * 5)) * 100 FROM DatastoreSample where provider = 'DynamoDbTable'  since 1 day ago timeseries 30 minutes

widgets.title: ALB
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.requestCount.Sum`) FROM LoadBalancerSample WHERE  provider = 'Alb' TIMESERIES FACET displayName SINCE 1565095119596 UNTIL 1565699919596

widgets.title: S3 - Top buckets by size (Gb)
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.bucketSizeBytes.Average`)/1000000000 from DatastoreSample WHERE provider = 'S3Bucket'  TIMESERIES 1 day FACET entityName SINCE 1 week ago until 1 day ago limit 5

widgets.title: RDS - WrOPS
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.writeIops.Average`) as 'Write Operations' From DatastoreSample WHERE provider = 'RdsDbInstance'  SINCE 6 hour ago TIMESERIES UNTIL 10 minutes ago facet displayName

widgets.title: EBS - Total Operations
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.volumeReadOps.Sum`) + average(`provider.volumeWriteOps.Sum`) FROM BlockDeviceSample WHERE provider = 'EbsVolume'  FACET displayName TIMESERIES since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Concurrent Lambda executions
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(`provider.concurrentExecutions.Average`) FROM ServerlessSample WHERE provider LIKE 'LambdaRegion'  FACET awsRegion SINCE 1 hour ago UNTIL 6 minutes ago TIMESERIES 5 minutes
